: : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :

Kup: I'm not really sure...

Rodimus Prime: I do. He simply retired when we switched from having one supreme Commander to the Maximal Council of Elders.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:11 AM
  Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron


  Nightlight::

  "What happen with Optimus??"asked Nightlight"is he still alive?"



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  > 
  > Kup: Well we are getting a little off track...
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: Go ahead and tell her the stories Kup. Our history 
  doesn't bother me, just Galvatron.
  > 
  > Kup: Very well. You see Nightlight Optimus had once been brought 
  back but with little control of himself. He was a zombie. It was all 
  a Quintesson trap. He was to lead us Autobots to are destruction. 
  Prime fought it though and saved us, however he was on a ship that 
  was destroyed. We thought he was lost forever. About six months later 
  we learned that a Science ship from Earth had been near by. They were 
  testing a new alloy, by seeing if their ship could withstand a sun 
  going nova near by. It did. They also pulled Optimus out before his 
  ship was destroyed. They had also taken aboard spores from the sun. 
  Mere contact with these spores turned living things into hateful 
  maniacs. The scientists who found the spores hated Transformers so 
  they lead us to find Optimus. Then they infected many Autobots. It 
  soon spread to the Decepticons, the human race, and then into the 
  universe. Rodimus was even infected. We managed to have a Quintesson 
  rebuild Optimus once again. By coating himself in the alloy from the 
  science ship he was able to take the Matrix of Leadership from 
  Rodimus. Optimus used the last power of the Matrix and destroyed the 
  Plague with the wisdom of the ages. Optimus continued to lead us from 
  then on untill the Great Wrs ended. Thats when everything was scaled 
  down and Maximals and Predacons were born.
  > 
  > OOC: The events I am talking about can be seen in the following 
  third season episodes of "The Transformers": "Dark 
  Awakaning," "Return of Optimus Prime Part. 1," and "Return of Optimus 
  Prime Part. 2"
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: airly2000 
  >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:13 AM
  >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  > 
  > 
  >   Nightlight:
  > 
  >   "But Didn't Optimus be..."she didnt't dare to say "dead", 'cause 
  that 
  >   could affect Rodimus. She asked "What was the Hate Plage?"
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   > : : Kup : :
  >   > 
  >   > Kup: Yes, Rodimus lead from 2005 through 2006. Then Optimus 
  came 
  >   back to us during the Hate Plague crises.
  >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:01 AM
  >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   >   OOC: Nightlight's memory circuits had damaged, due that she 
  >   didn't 
  >   >   know so much about The Great War
  >   > 
  >   >   Nightlight::
  >   > 
  >   >   "So that happen in the great war???" said Nightlight, she 
  knew 
  >   that 
  >   >   more pieces mor of her ancestors
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   >   > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Kup decided to inform Nighlight on everything with 
  Galvatron.
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Kup: Well, lass, it all goes back to the Great Wars. You 
  see 
  >   after 
  >   >   killing Optimus Prime in combat in 2005, Megatron was rebuilt 
  >   into 
  >   >   Galvatron by Unicron. Galvatron continued to lead the 
  Decepticons 
  >   >   from then on. Rodimus here lead the Autobots after he 
  destroyed 
  >   >   Unicron and saved Cybertron. Being that they were the 
  opposing 
  >   >   Commanders that kinda made them into arch rivals. This still 
  >   exists 
  >   >   to this day.
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > Rodimus Prime: The past continues to haunt me.....
  >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   From: airly2000 
  >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:47 PM
  >   >   >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   Nighlight::
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   "Who's... he?"asked Nightlight who wasn't sure if would 
  be 
  >   good 
  >   >   time 
  >   >   >   to ask. She never had seen Rodimus so upset.
  >   >   > 
  >   >   > 
  >   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   >   >   > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Rodimus recieved a comm message. When he activated it a 
  >   >   holographic 
  >   >   >   image of Galvatron appeared. It was perjected by the comm 
  >   system 
  >   >   in 
  >   >   >   his wrist. After it ended Rodimus looked inraged.
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Ahhhhhhhh! I'll get youuuuuuuuuuuu!
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Rodimus slams his fist intoa large boulder near by. The 
  >   boulder 
  >   >   >   crumbles around the Autobot's fist.
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: He thinks this is fun, Kup. When it 
  comes 
  >   down 
  >   >   to 
  >   >   >   just him and I, I'll take him down for good. I didn't get 
  it 
  >   done 
  >   >   >   before, but I'll make sure of it now...
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Kup: Calm down, lad. I know how you feel. i've been 
  with 
  >   you a 
  >   >   long 
  >   >   >   time Rody, I've seen all the crap he's done. You'll get 
  him, 
  >   and 
  >   >   I'll 
  >   >   >   be the first to congradulate you.
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Thanks old friend.
  >   >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   >   >   >   From: aerosmith60@c... 
  >   >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   >   >   >   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 7:40 PM
  >   >   >   >   Subject: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   Galvatron saw  Quilldart jet towards the base. "Good 
  no 
  >   doubt 
  >   >   the 
  >   >   >   other two are not far behind." He sent a comm to Rodimus. 
  A 
  >   >   >   holographic image of himself would display. "I am so glad 
  >   Rodimus 
  >   >   we 
  >   >   >   could come to terms. As for our one on one battle. Dont 
  you 
  >   >   worry. 
  >   >   >   That will happen in due time. Until then best of luck my 
  old 
  >   >   friend. 
  >   >   >   I havent had this much fun since our little unicron 
  >   >   >   adventure...wouldnt you agree?" He ended the comm and 
  turned 
  >   back 
  >   >   to 
  >   >   >   the map. He had his three blips on the screen.
